attributes.action: Modernise the "statutory standard" for overcrowded housing so that funding can be put in place to help Kate in lewisham and many others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Overcrowding is blighting the lives of many people in this country, the current statutory standard is very outdated and does not reflect modern times.My familly live in Lewisham where the problems are severe.If the standard were to be updated and funding made available larger properties could be built and others adapted to meet peoples needs.
